execution_plan.description: Find users who are members of more than one chat by joining users with chat_members and grouping by user.
execution_plan.query: SELECT users.id AS s1__id, users.username AS s1__username, users.full_name AS s1__full_name, COUNT(DISTINCT chat_members.chat_id) AS s1__chat_count FROM users INNER JOIN chat_members ON users.id = chat_members.user_id GROUP BY users.id, users.username, users.full_name HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT chat_members.chat_id) > 1;
